question:
What is the correct way to declare and initialize an array in Java?


int[] arr = _____;

What is the correct syntax to instantiate a `HashMap` in Java?


HashMap<String, Integer> map = _____;

What is the correct way to declare a constant in Java?


_____ final double PI = 3.14;

_____ final double PI = 3.14159;

_____ sb = new StringBuilder();

_____ list = new ArrayList<>();

_____ map = new HashMap<>();

_____ set = new HashSet<>();

map._____("key");

Which method is used to get the value associated with a key in a `HashMap`?


Integer value = map._____("key");

_____ myMethod();

_____ file = new File("path/to/file");

abstract _____ myMethod();
